text: Claude Goretta (23 June 1929 â€“ 20 February 2019) was a Swiss television producer and movie director. His 1973 movie L'Invitation was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film. His 1981 movie La provinciale was entered into the 31st Berlin International Film Festival. He was born in Geneva. Goretta died on 20 February 2019 in Geneva at the age of 89. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Swiss movie directors Category:Swiss screenwriters Category:Swiss movie producers Category:Television producers Category:Movie people from Geneva Category:Protestants
title: Claude Goretta
